com.appboy.dispatch
Class DispatchPolicy

java.lang.Object
  com.appboy.dispatch.DispatchPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDispatchPolicy
public final class DispatchPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDispatchPolicy

Responsible for reacting to events that may affect the ability of the sdk to execute network calls. This class maintains an overall 'DispatchState', which is checked before every attempt to communicate with the server. Current factors that affect the dispatch state are: 1) Connectivity 2) Battery Level 3) Foreground/Background DispatchState is correlated to the dispatch interval. See DispatchState enum Current Policy: No Connectivity -> DispatchState.OFF (will not attempt to contact server) Inactive Activity (backgrounded) -> DispatchState.SLEEPY (long delay, ~15 mins) WIFI or LTE -> DispatchState.GOOD (rapid flush, ~2 seconds) 2G or 3G -> DispatchState.DEFAULT (~10 seconds) Not used -> DispatchState.BAD (~30 seconds)
